form.author: Miguel Santana
form.description: Presents category items in a List. Each field put in the list position will be rendered as a column

field.name: cat_layout_order
field.label: Category Layout
field.description: Select the elements and order to be included in the category

field.name: cat_title_override
field.label: Title Override
field.description: Enter a title override for the category

field.name: cat_img_align
field.label: Image Aligment
field.description: Select the category image aligment

field.name: cat_filters_label
field.description: Enter the filter area heading. Include wrapping HTML tags.
field.label: Filter Area Label

field.name: cat_alphaindex_label
field.description: Enter the alpha index area heading. Include wrapping HTML tags.
field.label: Alpha Index Area Label

field.name: sub_cat_sep
field.description: Settings for sub-categories

field.name: sub_cat_label
field.label: Sub-Category Area Label
field.description: Enter the sub-categories area label. Include wrapping HTML tags.

field.name: sub_cat_ul_class
field.label: Sub-Categories List CSS Class
field.description: Add a CSS class string for sub-categories list

field.name: sub_cat_li_class
field.label: Sub-Categories Item CSS Class
field.description: Add a CSS class string for sub-categories items

field.name: sub_cat_title_headding
field.label: Sub-Categories Title Heading
field.description: Select the sub-categories heading level

field.name: sub_cat_link_title
field.label: Link to Subcategory Title
field.description: Open Iten when clicking on the Title

field.name: sub_cat_img_align
field.label: Image Aligment
field.description: Select the sub-categories image aligment

field.name: sub_cat_items
field.label: Show Items within each subcategory
field.description: Show or hide items under each sub-category. Make sure the option Display Subcategories Items is enabled in Items List Creation, and the option Sub-categories is enabled in Sub-categories sections above. When this option is set to Yes items in subcategories will be displayed under each subcategory instead of the main items list.

field.name: sub_cat_items_style
field.label: Items Style
field.description: If showing subcategories items, select whether such list is a plain list, a list of links, or use the same settings from the intro items list

field.name: map_sep
field.description: Settings for map display

field.name: map_display
field.label: Display Map
field.description: Display items in a map using latitude and longitude information from a specified address field.

field.name: map_addr_field
field.label: Map Address Field (lat/lon)
field.description: Select an address field that contains the latitude/longitude information for items.

field.name: map_width
field.label: Map Width
field.description: Width of the map container in px or %

field.name: map_height
field.label: Map Height
field.description: Height of the map container in px or %

field.name: map_type
field.label: Map Type
field.description: Select the type of map to show

field.name: map_zoom_control
field.label: Display Zoom Control
field.description: Select whether the zoom control should be displayed. This control allows the user to to zoom in and out.

field.name: map_pan_control
field.label: Display Pan Control
field.description: Select whether the pan control should be displayed. This control allows to move the map and in some cases rotate it.

field.name: map_type_control
field.label: Display Map Type Control
field.description: Select whether the map type control should be displayed. This control allows the user to change the map type (i.e. rodadmap, satellite, hybrid, terrain)

field.name: map_zoom_scrollwheel
field.label: Scrollwheel Zoom
field.description: Select whether the map will zoom in and out using the mouse scrollwheel.

field.name: map_pretext
field.label: Maps Pre-Text
field.description: Enter text to be displayed before the map. Include wrapping HTML tags.

field.name: map_posttext
field.label: Maps Post-Text
field.description: Enter text to be displayed after the map. Include wrapping HTML tags.

field.name: map_css_class
field.label: Map CSS Class
field.description: Add a CSS class string for map container div

field.name: map_google_api_key
field.label: Google Maps API Key
field.description: Enter the Google Maps API key for use when displaying the map.

field.name: map_title_headding
field.label: Title heading level
field.description: To select the Title heading level

field.name: map_title_field
field.label: Title Field
field.description: Select a field to use as item title. Leave blank to use default item title.

field.name: map_date_format
field.label: Date Format
field.description: Enter the format for dates. Uses JDate::format specification, based on PHP date function http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php

field.name: map_desc_field
field.label: Description Field
field.description: Select the field to use as item description. Leave blank to use item's description (main content)

field.name: map_desc_cut
field.label: Description Maximum Characters
field.description: Enter the maximum number of characters allowed in the item description.

field.name: map_readmore_label
field.label: Read More Label
field.description: Label to use in read more link

field.name: map_class
field.label: CSS Class
field.description: Add a CSS class string for items

field.name: map_img_sep
field.description: Item image settings

field.name: map_img
field.label: Image Field
field.description: Select the field to use for item image

field.name: map_img_size
field.label: Image Size
field.description: Select image size to use

field.name: map_img_width
field.label: Width (px)
field.description: Specify image width in pixels. Only applicable when selecting Custom Size in Image Size

field.name: map_img_height
field.label: Height (px)
field.description: Specify image height in pixels. Only applicable when selecting Custom Size in Image Size

field.name: map_img_method
field.label: Processing Method
field.description: Select the processing method for custom size images

field.name: map_img_link
field.label: Image Clickable
field.description: Make the image a link to the item

field.name: map_img_align
field.label: Image Aligment
field.description: Select the item image aligment

field.name: map_img_class
field.label: CSS Class
field.description: Add a CSS class string for item's image

field.name: items_settings_sep
field.description: Parameters for items lists

field.name: featured_separate
field.label: Separate Featured Items
field.description: To separate Fetured Items list

field.name: leading_num
field.label: # Leading Items
field.description: Number of leading items

field.name: items_addthis
field.label: Sharing Buttons
field.description: Show or hide AddThis sharing buttons on individual items.

field.name: items_disqus
field.label: Comments Count
field.description: Show or hide Disqus comments count on individual items.

field.name: items_no_items
field.label: Display "No Items Found"
field.description: Show or hide the "No Items Found" label

field.name: items_no_items_label
field.label: "No Items Found" Label Override
field.description: Text to use for the "No Items Found" label. Leave blank to use default.

field.name: leading_label
field.label: Lead Items List Label
field.description: Enter the lead items list label. Include wrapping HTML tags.

field.name: leading_title_headding
field.label: Title heading level
field.description: To select the Title heading level

field.name: leading_title_field
field.label: Title Field
field.description: Select a field to use as item title. Leave blank to use default item title.

field.name: leading_date_format
field.label: Date Format
field.description: Enter the format for dates. Uses JDate::format specification, based on PHP date function http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php

field.name: leading_desc_field
field.label: Description Field
field.description: Select the field to use as item description. Leave blank to use item's description (main content)

field.name: leading_desc_cut
field.label: Description Maximum Characters
field.description: Enter the maximum number of characters allowed in the item description.

field.name: leading_readmore_label
field.label: Read More Label
field.description: Label to use in read more link

field.name: leading_writtenby_label
field.label: Written by Label
field.description: Label to use before author name

field.name: leading_class
field.label: CSS Class
field.description: Add a CSS class string for items

field.name: leading_img_sep
field.description: Item image settings

field.name: leading_img
field.label: Image Field
field.description: Select the field to use for item image

field.name: leading_img_size
field.label: Image Size
field.description: Select image size to use

field.name: leading_img_width
field.label: Width (px)
field.description: Specify image width in pixels. Only applicable when selecting Custom Size in Image Size

field.name: leading_img_height
field.label: Height (px)
field.description: Specify image height in pixels. Only applicable when selecting Custom Size in Image Size

field.name: leading_img_method
field.label: Processing Method
field.description: Select the processing method for custom size images

field.name: leading_img_link
field.label: Image Clickable
field.description: Make the image a link to the item

field.name: leading_img_align
field.label: Image Aligment
field.description: Select the item image aligment

field.name: leading_img_class
field.label: CSS Class
field.description: Add a CSS class string for item's image

field.name: introitems_label
field.label: Intro Items List Label
field.description: Enter the intro items list label. Include wrapping HTML tags.

field.name: introitems_title_headding
field.label: Title heading level
field.description: To select the Title heading level

field.name: introitems_title_field
field.label: Title Field
field.description: Select a field to use as item title. Leave blank to use default item title.

field.name: introitems_date_format

field.name: introitems_readmore_label
field.label: Read More Label

field.name: introitems_writtenby_label
field.label: Written by Label
field.description: Label to use before author name

field.name: introitems_class
field.label: CSS Class
field.description: Add a CSS class string for items

field.name: introitems_img_sep
field.description: Item image settings

field.name: introitems_img
field.label: Image Field
field.description: Select the field to use for item image

field.name: introitems_img_size
field.label: Image Size
field.description: Select image size to use

field.name: introitems_img_width
field.label: Width (px)
field.description: Specify image width in pixels. Only applicable when selecting Custom Size in Image Size

field.name: introitems_img_height
field.label: Height (px)
field.description: Specify image height in pixels. Only applicable when selecting Custom Size in Image Size

field.name: introitems_img_method
field.label: Processing Method
field.description: Select the processing method for custom size images

field.name: introitems_img_link
field.label: Image Clickable
field.description: Make the image a link to the item

field.name: introitems_img_align
field.label: Image Aligment
field.description: Select the item image aligment

field.name: introitems_img_class
field.label: CSS Class
field.description: Add a CSS class string for item's image

field.name: featured_label
field.label: Featured Items List Label
field.description: Enter the featured items list label. Include wrapping HTML tags.

field.name: featured_title_field

field.name: css_group_sep
field.description: Adds CSS classes to the field groups

field.name: css_group_1
field.label: Group 1
field.description: CSS class for fields group 1

field.label: Group 2
field.description: CSS class for fields group 2
